sentences.sContent: But he also felt that ultimately the whole of reality seemed to be constructed as if by some great cosmic prankster.
sentences.sContent_eng: But he also felt that ultimately the whole of reality seemed to be constructed as if by some great cosmic prankster.
sentences.sCn: 但是他也觉得最终一切的现实看上去似乎只是一个爱开玩笑的造物主构造出来的而已。

synos.tran: 爱开玩笑的人；顽皮的人；恶作剧的人

trans.tranCn: 顽皮的人, 爱开玩笑的人
